name: Marbles and Monsters
description:
Knowledge and artifacts have been stolen from the lands of your ancestors and you, a brave scholar of magic, have been entrusted by your village to return the relics.

A pixel art top down platformer with physics, like a marble labyrinth brought to life.  The player collects scrolls and artifacts hidden away in trap-filled mazes and monster lairs across the realm.  Magic spells such as force bubbles and entangling vines can be learned along the way to protect against damage, push away enemies, and levitate over pits.

Requires accelerometer/gyro to play.  Tilt phone/tablet to move.  Tap spell icon to cast spells.  Currently download only.  Working on a web-playable HTML5 build.
